name: SHOTGUN HAMBURGER
description:
A game about a hamburger with a shotgun. In development. 3 stages, 3 bosses. Take down your nemesis, pistol Hot Dog. Inspired by Cuphead. Controls are

Z - High Jump

X - Low Jump

Arrow keys - Fire

Firing also adds recoil that you can use to propel yourself into the air!

Also, if the game does not work, try clicking on it again.

For the GB jam, it fits the theme. The weekly jam was kind of a second thought because it started at the same time, but for that theme, you are hurling bullets at your enemies. Thanks! Please leave a review!
